data.title: Hope Pink
data.meta_description: The Pink Hope are just what you need to brighten up any outfit on a sunny day. They make a statement without shouting but are fun and fresh! These are show stopper shades made to enjoy life wearing. *Please note these are from the DLAM collection 2020*
data.text:
The better you care for anything, the longer it will last so

please look after your sunglasses.

If you wear them on your head they will stretch so please

avoid this.

Keep them in the case to keep them safe.

Clean them with a non abrasive cloth like the one that came

with them.

The better you care for anything, the longer it will last so

please look after your sunglasses.

If you wear them on your head they will stretch so please

avoid this.

Keep them in the case to keep them safe.

Clean them with a non abrasive cloth like the one that came

with them.

It is possible to reglaze our frames with a prescription lens, however do check with your optician as there can be restrictions on the size of the lens they are willing to glaze.

All of our sunglasses comply with British and European standards comply with BS EN ISO 12312-1:2013+A1:2015

Filter category 2 - Medium protection against sun glare

UV 400 protection

Warning: not for direct observation of the sun

Not for protection against artificial light sources

Not for use as eye protection against mechanical impact hazards

Not suitable for driving at night or in dull light

It is possible to reglaze our frames with a prescription lens, however do check with your optician as there can be restrictions on the size of the lens they are willing to glaze.

All of our sunglasses comply with British and European standards comply with BS EN ISO 12312-1:2013+A1:2015

Filter category 2 - Medium protection against sun glare

UV 400 protection

Warning: not for direct observation of the sun

Not for protection against artificial light sources

Not for use as eye protection against mechanical impact hazards

Not suitable for driving at night or in dull light

All of our frames come with a vegan leather protective case

that is lightweight and easy to carry.

Our signature patterned cloths are perfect for keeping your

lenses and frames clean.

We encourage you to give a new life and purpose to our

beautiful, strong branded boxes. There are three designs to collect.
